name: Farm Cake-Michelle Whiting
steps: Cream butter and cream cheese with sugar. Add eggs 1 at a time beating thoroughly.Add vanilla. Blend in flour. Bake at 350 for 45 -65 min. Don't overcook. Invert to cool.
Frosting: Boil together sugar, milk, margarine. Boil for 1 min. Add 1/2 tsp vanilla Stir while cools put pan in water and ice to speed the cooling process.
Me-I glaze this with a simple powdered sugar and lemon juice glaze.
